title: Settings
appDescription: The "Uspacy Integration with Webflow Forms" application is an essential tool for optimizing and automating your business, especially if you are using forms on the Webflow platform and aiming to efficiently manage leads and deals. This integration application allows for the automatic transfer of data from Webflow forms directly to your CRM system in Uspacy.
autoSendData: Automatic Data Transfer: With this application, you can configure automatic data transfer of client information to your CRM from your Webflow website. This saves time and eliminates the need for manual data processing.
instructionsForWebFlow: Instructions for connecting can be found
anyQuestions: If you have any questions or encounter specific issues with the functionality of this integration, the AlterEGO team is ready to provide you with consultation and assistance.
helpYou: and we will be happy to help you find the optimal solution for your business.
